description: To address the issue outlined in CVE-2023-5472, users are advised to update to the latest version of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), specifically version 118.0.2088.76, released on October 27, 2023. This version incorporates crucial security enhancements derived from the Chromium software that mitigates the noted vulnerability effectively. Users can confirm their current version of Microsoft Edge by navigating to the menu, selecting 'Help and feedback', and then 'About Microsoft Edge'. The update is significant for Windows 10 x64-based systems, with a build number of 118.0.5993.117 also addressing similar fixes. Ensure you check the Microsoft support lifecycle for ongoing updates regarding this product.
